page.title: 15RELIGIONS & EVENTS
page.content:
{ In Kingsley}and the surounding area there are five Churches and one Cemetry. In Kingsley village there is one{Church of England}and two {Methodist Chapels.}We also hold religous assemblies at school. Around the area about{98%}of the {population}are{Christian.
A{fox hunt}takes place and goes through Kingsley.It starts at a public house called the Horeshoe and it goes past our school.They usually go straight to the forest and then they split up into different groups usually twos and threes.
There is also the{Rose Queen. There is a different person crowned every year. It is a girl who has been going to church for a long time and is aged between 14 aged 16.
